translation.en: - Well, I expect it'll cloud over later on. - Aye.

translation.en: We at the Ipswich Museum pride ourselves on our work,
translation.ja: 私ども イプスウィッチ博物館が―

translation.en: and I… I think you'll agree that it's rock solid.
translation.ja: 確固たる発見をしました

translation.en: - You… You need to stop there. - I beg your pardon?
translation.ja: 入ってはいけない 何だと？

translation.en: This is a very delicate site, and it ain't safe. Uh, not for a man of your size.
translation.ja: 壊れやすいから その体格では無理だ

translation.en: Is this your work?
translation.ja: 君は？

translation.en: Uh, yes. I'm Basil Brown, excavator.
translation.ja: 掘削者の バジル･ブラウンです

translation.en: Well, Basil Brown, excavator…
translation.ja: 掘削者のブラウンさん 私は…

translation.en: I am Charles Phillips, archaeologist,
translation.ja: 考古学者のフィリップスだ

translation.en: and I'm here to tell you that,
translation.ja: 今日は通告に来た

translation.en: as this is a find of national interest,
translation.ja: これは国レベルの発見だから

translation.en: the British Museum will be taking charge.
translation.ja: 大英博物館が発掘を行う

translation.en: Your work…
translation.ja: 君は…

translation.en: looks, thankfully, decent,
translation.ja: まともに作業したようだ

translation.en: but your excavating service is no longer required.
translation.ja: だが今後は掘削者は必要ない

translation.en: Am… Am I to understand that you will be personally taking over?
translation.ja: あなたが引き継ぐと 言うんですか？

translation.en: Grimes, I have never seen anything like it.
translation.ja: グライムズ 世紀の大発見だ

translation.en: - Quite, sir. - Brailesford.
translation.ja: 驚きです

translation.en: - Sir. - Cancel everything I've got.
translation.ja: 私の今後の予定は全て中止だ

translation.en: Find out who's free. We need Piggott.
translation.ja: 人が要る　ピゴットを呼べ

translation.en: - Find us lodgings, as near as you can. - Yes, sir.
translation.ja: 近くに宿を探せ はい

translation.en: That dark soil in the middle, C.W., looks very promising.
translation.ja: あの濃い土はいい兆候だ

translation.en: You men, finish up, and don't move another pebble!
translation.ja: 君らは作業を止めろ 何も触るな

translation.en: Excuse me, Mr. Phillips.
translation.ja: あなたは…

translation.en: I'm not employed by you.
translation.ja: 私の雇用主じゃない

translation.en: I'm employed by Mrs. Pretty, and I'll keep on working until she tells me different.
translation.ja: プリティさんの指示なしには 止めません

translation.en: An ad hoc team from a provincial museum cannot be left in charge.
translation.ja: 地方博物館の素性も知れない やからには任せられん

translation.en: Mrs. Pretty must see that.
translation.ja: プリティさんも理解するさ

translation.en: John, a minute is all I need. I… I know she'll want to hear this.
translation.ja: １分でいい 大切な話なんだ

translation.en: - All right, all right. Wait here. - Right.
translation.ja: 待っててくれ

translation.en: She'll see you tomorrow morning at 10:30.
translation.ja: 明日の朝 出直してくれ

translation.en: She must know what I found.
translation.ja: 緊急なんだ

translation.en: - Don't push it, old boy! - She must know!
translation.ja: 無理強いは止めろ

translation.en: - - John!
translation.ja: ジョン！

translation.en: - Is he gone, Mr. Grateley? - It's not Grateley.
translation.ja: 追い返した？ 私です

translation.en: I… I'm sorry for disturbing you, but I believe…
translation.ja: お邪魔して申し訳ないが

translation.en: we may have found a burial chamber in the ship.
translation.ja: 船の埋葬室を 見つけたようです

translation.en: - Does Mr. Phillips know? - I don't work for Mr. Phillips.
translation.ja: フィリップスさんは何と？ 雇用主のあなたの 意向を聞きたい

translation.en: What are your wishes?
translation.ja: 雇用主のあなたの 意向を聞きたい

translation.en: I, uh… He just informed me that, by order of the Ministry of Works, the site must be placed under his control.
translation.ja: 建設省の命令だから 引き渡せと言われたの

translation.en: Well, uh…
translation.ja: だったら…

translation.en: …that's that, then.
translation.ja: おしまいだ

translation.en: Well, I… I can carry on for one more day… if that's what you'd like.
translation.ja: お望みなら もう１日だけ続けますよ

translation.en: Are… Are you poorly, Mrs. Pretty?
translation.ja: 具合が悪いのですか？

translation.en: Perhaps you might, um…
translation.ja: ベルを…

translation.en: might ring the bell for me.
translation.ja: 鳴らして

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: He's got no right to dictate to you. This ship's only appearing because of you.
translation.ja: 彼に命令する権限はない あの船が見つかったのは―

translation.en: Don't forget why you wanted it begun.
translation.ja: あなたが言い当てたからだ

translation.en: Now, you said that was a feeling. Your feeling is right.
translation.ja: 何かがあると 感じたんですよね

translation.en: - Mr. Brown seems to have found his way in. - Mr. Brown.
translation.ja: 入ってきたの 困ります

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Is there anything I could bring you?
translation.ja: お飲み物を？

translation.en: Fetch Ellen for me, please.
translation.ja: エレンを呼んで

translation.en: Mrs. Pretty is keen to keep you on,
translation.ja: プリティさんの意向だから

translation.en: so we'll make good use of you.
translation.ja: 君にも仕事を与える

translation.en: Your primary task will be to keep the site in order.
translation.ja: 雑務をやってもらう

translation.en: So, I want the tumulus dug back to an area of four feet on either side,
translation.ja: 墳丘の両側を外に １メートルほど堀り広げろ

translation.en: and I want those spoil heaps removed.
translation.ja: あの廃土も処理するように

translation.en: From now on, you're not to set foot in the body of the ship without my express permission.
translation.ja: 今後は私の許可なしに 船の内側に入らないこと

translation.en: Carry on.
translation.ja: 始めろ

translation.en: Are you gonna put up with that, Basil?
translation.ja: 我慢するのか

translation.en: Hello, Mr. Brown.
translation.ja: ブラウンさん 母さんが胸焼けなんだ

translation.en: - My mother's got her heartburn. - Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.
translation.ja: ブラウンさん 母さんが胸焼けなんだ そりゃ お大事に

translation.en: She has to have peace and quiet. I made her this.
translation.ja: これを作ってあげた

translation.en: - Well, that's a very fine rocket. - Where are you going?
translation.ja: 立派なロケットだ どこ行くの？

translation.en: Oh, I… Oh, I have to go home now.
translation.ja: 家に帰る

translation.en: When will you be back?
translation.ja: いつ戻るの？

translation.en: Well, uh… I'm sorry, Robert. I…
translation.ja: それは…　ごめんよ

translation.en: I am.
translation.ja: 悪いな

translation.en: Uh, but, Mr. Brown…
translation.ja: ブラウンさん

translation.en: Mr. Brown!
translation.ja: 待ってよ

translation.en: - Mr. Brown! - It seems I'm out of a job.
translation.ja: ブラウンさん 僕は用無しだ

translation.en: Phillips won't let us in his ship.
translation.ja: “私の船に入るな”だと

translation.en: His ship? Really?
translation.ja: “私の”？

translation.en: I thought I might take some photographs. It could make a useful record.
translation.ja: 代わりに写真を撮ろうと思う

translation.en: - Would you mind? - Not at all.
translation.ja: 代わりに写真を撮ろうと思う いいわよ 私を撮らないならね

translation.en: - As long as they're not of me. -
translation.ja: いいわよ 私を撮らないならね

translation.en: Can't say I blame Brown.
translation.ja: ブラウンさんが 辞めたのも仕方ない

translation.en: Such a decent man doesn't deserve Phillips.
translation.ja: ブラウンさんが 辞めたのも仕方ない 相手が悪い

translation.en: Blame him?
translation.ja: 辞めた？

translation.en: Well, he left this morning. Didn't you know?
translation.ja: 今朝 出てったよ

translation.en: Where's Robert?
translation.ja: ロバートは？

translation.en: You don't have another job?
translation.ja: 仕事のあては？

translation.en: I'll write to Maynard, and he'll give me something.
translation.ja: メイナードに聞いてみる

translation.en: Did you tell Mrs. Pretty you were leaving?
translation.ja: プリティさんには？

translation.en: I thought I'd let her work it out herself.
translation.ja: 誰かが伝えるさ

translation.en: And that's the thanks she gets for giving you the opportunity in the first place?
translation.ja: 機会を与えてくれた人に 失礼よ

translation.en: Mark my words, May, I won't receive any credit.
translation.ja: 名前も載らないんだぞ

translation.en: - I won't even be a footnote. - Is that why you took the job?
translation.ja: 脚注にすらね 功績が大事？

translation.en: - For credit? - How can I stay on?
translation.ja: 功績が大事？ 雑用をやれるか

translation.en: Is that why you've been digging your whole life for barely enough
translation.ja: 雑用をやれるか 掘るのは功績のため？

translation.en: to cover our rent?
translation.ja: 掘るのは功績のため？

translation.en: No, May. I do it 'cause I'm good at it.
translation.ja: 違う 私の天職だからだ

translation.en: 'Cause that's what my father taught me, and what his father taught him.
translation.ja: 父や祖父から受け継いだ

translation.en: 'Cause you can show me a handful of soil from anywhere in Suffolk, and I can pretty much tell you whose land it's from.
translation.ja: サフォークの土なら一目で どの土地のものか分かる

translation.en: There you go.
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: Excuse me. Do you know Basil Brown?
translation.ja: バジル･ブラウンさんの家は どこですか？

translation.en: - Do you know where he lives? - Yes, I know Basil.
translation.ja: バジル･ブラウンさんの家は どこですか？ ここを真っすぐ行くと着くわ

translation.en: He lives on a farm outside of the village. Carry on that way.
translation.ja: ここを真っすぐ行くと着くわ

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: I found that ship.
translation.ja: 私が船を見つけた

translation.en: I may not be a fellow at Cambridge, but I worked out what was down there.
translation.ja: 私は教授じゃないが 船があると分かった

translation.en: And Jacobs and Spooner, too, and nobody'll remember that.
translation.ja: ジェイコブズとスプーナーも 貢献したのに…

translation.en: You don't know that.
translation.ja: 認められるわ

translation.en: And if you're not around to see it to the end, there's even less chance.
translation.ja: 今 辞めたら無理だろうけど

translation.en: You always told me your work isn't about the past or even the present. It's for the future.
translation.ja: 発掘は過去や現在でなく 未来のためなんでしょ

translation.en: So that the next generations can know where they came from.
translation.ja: 次の世代にルーツを 伝えるのよね

translation.en: The line that joins them to their forebears. Isn't that what you always say?
translation.ja: 未来の人と祖先を 繋(つな)げる仕事でしょ

translation.en: Yeah, something like that.
translation.ja: その通りだ

translation.en: Why else would the lot of you be playing in the dirt while the rest of the country prepares for war?
translation.ja: だから戦争が近づいても 土を掘り続ける

translation.en: - Because that means something, innit? -
translation.ja: 意義があるから

translation.en: Something that'll last longer than whatever damn war we're heading into.
translation.ja: 戦争より 永劫(ごう)の価値があるから

translation.en: Good hell.
translation.ja: 今のは―

translation.en: That's Robert.
translation.ja: ロバートだ

translation.en: - Robert? -
translation.ja: ここだよ

translation.en: - - Robert!
translation.ja: ロバート

translation.en: Mr. Brown!
translation.ja: ブラウンさん

translation.en: Robert, have you cycled all this way?
translation.ja: 自転車で来たのか

translation.en: You promised.
translation.ja: 約束は？

translation.en: May! May!
translation.ja: おい メイ

translation.en: You said you'd show me the cosmos. You promised.
translation.ja: 宇宙を見せてくれないの？

translation.en: - Good heavens! Who have we here? - This is Robert Pretty.
translation.ja: どこの子？ ロバート･プリティだ

translation.en: Robert, I'm Mrs. Brown.
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: I bet you have a rare thirst after that long ride, don't you?
translation.ja: ずっと漕(こ)いできて 喉が渇いたでしょ

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - Come you here.
translation.ja: ずっと漕(こ)いできて 喉が渇いたでしょ おいで

translation.en: - Let's get you a cup of milk. - That's a long way.
translation.ja: ミルクを飲むといい

translation.en: Does your mother know you're here, Robert?
translation.ja: お母さんには？

translation.en: - How'd you find your way? - She know you cycled?
translation.ja: よく道が分かったね

translation.en: - Should I take your bike for you? - Yes, please.
translation.ja: 自転車を 腹も減ったろ プリティさんに電話する

translation.en: I better find a telephone, May. Call Mrs. Pretty.
translation.ja: 腹も減ったろ プリティさんに電話する

translation.en: - Thank you. - He's all right.
translation.ja: 無事ですよ　家の中にいます

translation.en: - He's inside. Uh, come this way. - Thank you.
translation.ja: 無事ですよ　家の中にいます 心配したわ

translation.en: - We were obviously very worried. - Yes. He's… He's…
translation.ja: 心配したわ お察しします

translation.en: Uh, this is May, my wife.
translation.ja: 家内のメイです

translation.en: - Mrs. Pretty. - Thank you very much.
translation.ja: プリティさんだ

translation.en: He's been no trouble. A lovely boy.
translation.ja: いい子にしてましたよ

translation.en: Mrs. Brown has a music box from Whitby covered in all manner of shells.
translation.ja: 貝飾りのオルゴールを 見せてくれたよ

translation.en: Would you like to see?
translation.ja: 見る？

translation.en: Uh, no. We've imposed on your kindness enough.
translation.ja: もう十分 ご迷惑をおかけしたわ

translation.en: What were you thinking?
translation.ja: いけない子ね

translation.en: You could have been lost or killed.
translation.ja: 危険なことして

translation.en: - Robert… what were you thinking? - I'm sorry, Mother.
translation.ja: ロバート なぜ？ ごめんなさい

translation.en: Uh, Robert came to remind me of a promise that I made.
translation.ja: 約束のことで来たんです

translation.en: I said I'd show him the stars through my telescope. Didn't I?
translation.ja: 天体望遠鏡で 星を見せてやると約束したね

translation.en: Then you're returning?
translation.ja: では戻るわね

translation.en: I am. Yes.
translation.ja: ええ そうします

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Morning!
translation.ja: おはよう

translation.en: Morning.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: Mr. Grimes. I've been, uh… taking notes.
translation.ja: グライムズさん 私のメモです

translation.en: - Ah! - If they be of any use.
translation.ja: 役立つかな

translation.en: Why, they'd save me days.
translation.ja: 助かります

translation.en: - You must have suspected what was here. - Well, you've made good progress.
translation.ja: すごい洞察力だ 順調のようだね

translation.en: As did you.
translation.ja: あなたのおかげだ

translation.en: Thank you kindly.
translation.ja: 光栄だ

translation.en: - It's fine work, Mr. Brown. - Yeah. Well, we made a start.
translation.ja: いい仕事をされた 幕を開けただけだ

translation.en: - Phillips. - Our excavator has returned.
translation.ja: フィリップス 掘削者が戻ったな

translation.en: Morning.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: There's a sign in the bottom of the ship
translation.ja: 船底に潜んでいる―

translation.en: that there could be an intact chamber.
translation.ja: 船底に潜んでいる― 兆候がある

translation.en: Tremendously exciting.
translation.ja: すばらしい

translation.en: What about events in the wider world, C.W.? How do you think it will affect us?
translation.ja: 戦争が始まれば 発掘はどうなるのかな

translation.en: Judging by last night's news…
translation.ja: ニュースを見る限り―

translation.en: I think we could be at war in a matter of weeks,
translation.ja: 開戦まで数週間だろう

translation.en: and every excavation in the land will stop.
translation.ja: 全国の発掘が中止される

translation.en: - So, it's up to us.  -
translation.ja: 急がねば

translation.en: - Oh, good lord.  - Gosh.
translation.ja: これは驚いた

translation.en: - Jim! Billy Grimes! - Stuart!
translation.ja: ジムにグライムズ スチュアート

translation.en: - How the devil are you? - Very well.
translation.ja: 元気か？ もちろん

translation.en: - This is my wife, Margaret. - Peggy.
translation.ja: 妻のマーガレットだ ペギーよ

translation.en: Mrs. Piggott, a pleasure to meet you.
translation.ja: やあ ピゴット夫人

translation.en: Mr. Phillips, I-- um, I wanted to say how pleased I was that you specifically asked for me to come.
translation.ja: 私を指名してくださって 感謝します

translation.en: I know Stuart sent you my paper on Bosnian Lake villagers. It was awfully good of you to read it.
translation.ja: 論文を読んでいただけて すごく光栄です

translation.en: Ah, yes. Um, very stimulating.
translation.ja: ああ 面白かったよ

translation.en: I hope I'll be able to repay your faith in me.
translation.ja: 期待に応えます

translation.en: I have no doubt.
translation.ja: 楽しみだな

translation.en: It's just that I haven't done much actual fieldwork yet.
translation.ja: ただ 現場での作業経験が

translation.en: Uh, so I wouldn't want you to think I'm more experienced than I really am.
translation.ja: 実はほとんどないんです

translation.en: Ah, you have all the key attributes.
translation.ja: 君は一番の適任者だよ

translation.en: Do I?
translation.ja: 私が？

translation.en: - This ship is very delicate. - Mm- hmm. One could say, it, um, scarcely exists at all.
translation.ja: 船は非常にもろい状態だ 無に等しいとも言える

translation.en: Too much weight, it disintegrates.
translation.ja: 重さですぐ崩れる

translation.en: You're probably less than nine stone, so I'll supervise from here
translation.ja: 君は57キロもないだろう 私は監督をして 体重の軽い君が掘る

translation.en: while you light things get on with the digging.
translation.ja: 私は監督をして 体重の軽い君が掘る

translation.en: Am I to understand you only asked for me because of my size?
translation.ja: 軽いから私を？

translation.en: Uh, lucky guess, actually.
translation.ja: よかったよ

translation.en: Yeah, thank God Piggott didn't marry a piglet.
translation.ja: 子豚のような 奥さんじゃなくて

translation.en: Carry on!
translation.ja: 続けて

translation.en: - How does it look to you? - Sir?
translation.ja: ブレイルスフォード 君の所見は？

translation.en: What have you got there?
translation.ja: それは何だ？

translation.en: All right, then.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: - First round's on me, chaps! - Very nice of you.
translation.ja: まずは私がおごる

translation.en: Do they not have a… a double?
translation.ja: ツインだわ

translation.en: Sorry, darling, no. This is fine, though, isn't it?
translation.ja: 構わないだろう？

translation.en: We don't… We don't want to start by making a fuss.
translation.ja: わがまま言うのも悪いし

translation.en: Oh, no. Of course not.
translation.ja: ええ もちろんよ

translation.en: We're so lucky to be part of this.
translation.ja: 発掘に加われて幸運だ

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: - Yes, it's going to be amazing. - Mm.
translation.ja: すばらしい機会だわ

translation.en: Would you prefer this bed…
translation.ja: 君はこっち？

translation.en: or… or… or that one?
translation.ja: それとも…

translation.en: I'll… I'll take this one, shall I?
translation.ja: 僕があっちにする

translation.en: You need to find a star and identify its direction of travel.
translation.ja: 星を見つけて 移動する方角を見極める

translation.en: - Good evening, gentlemen. - Good evening, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.ja: こんばんは プリティさん

translation.en: - Hello, Mother. - Hello, darling.
translation.ja: やあ 母さん ロバート

translation.en: Do space pilots navigate using the stars?
translation.ja: 宇宙でも星で位置確認する？

translation.en: Oh, most certainly, they do.
translation.ja: もちろんだよ

translation.en: Ten more minutes, Commander. Then, bed.
translation.ja: 宇宙飛行士さん そろそろ寝る時間よ

translation.en: I see a star.
translation.ja: 星が見える

translation.en: - Oh, God! - What's going on?
translation.ja: あら 何だ？

translation.en: - It just gave way. - Get her off there!
translation.ja: 急に沈んで ピゴット 引っ張り出せ

translation.en: - Piggott, get her off! - Oh, I'm so sorry!
translation.ja: ピゴット 引っ張り出せ 本当にすみません

translation.en: - I didn't mean to damage anything. - Oh, you…
translation.ja: 本当にすみません

translation.en: - What you got, Brailesford? - You all right?
translation.ja: それは何だ？

translation.en: Sort of rusted lumps.
translation.ja: 何か…　さびた塊

translation.en: Come on, man. Where's your training?
translation.ja: それが識者の語彙(い)か

translation.en: Uh, an amorphous mass of corroded objects, sir.
translation.ja: 無定形の腐食生成物です

translation.en: You, get your camera down there. Photograph it.
translation.ja: そこの君 写真を撮って

translation.en: That's… That's very hot in the full sun.
translation.ja: 日射病に気をつけて

translation.en: Oh, I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.ja: 大丈夫です

translation.en: Watch your step there. This could well be our chamber.
translation.ja: 気をつけろ 埋葬室かもしれん

translation.en: Some barley water, Mrs. Piggott?
translation.ja: どうぞ 飲んで

translation.en: - Thank you. So clumsy. - Oh, not at all.
translation.ja: どうも　ドジで恥ずかしい そんなことない

translation.en: - That's a very lovely skirt. - Oh.
translation.ja: すてきな服ね

translation.en: Completely useless. I don't have anything more suitable.
translation.ja: 休暇から駆け付けたから スカートしかなくて

translation.en: - We came straight from our holiday. - Did you really?
translation.ja: 休暇から駆け付けたから スカートしかなくて そう？

translation.ja: 女王が地球を見下すと 息子が立派に育っていた 宇宙飛行士になってる

translation.en: And she knew that when he made his first journey up to the stars,
translation.ja: 女王は知ってた 息子が星へ旅立つとき―

translation.en: she would be there to meet him.
translation.ja: 宇宙で彼に会えると

translation.en: This morning, the British ambassador
translation.ja: 今朝 在ベルリン イギリス大使が―

translation.en: in Berlin handed the German government a final note…
translation.ja: 今朝 在ベルリン イギリス大使が― ドイツ政府に 最後通告を渡しました

translation.en: stating that, unless we heard from them by 11 o'clock,
translation.ja: ポーランドから 即時撤兵する旨の回答が―

translation.en: that they were prepared at once to withdraw their troops from Poland,
translation.ja: 11時までに得られない場合は 英独両国は

translation.en: a state of war would exist between us.
translation.ja: 戦争状態となると 通告しました

translation.en: I have to tell you now that no such undertaking has been received,
translation.ja: この通告に対して 回答が得られないため

translation.en: and that, consequently, this country is at war with Germany.
translation.ja: 我が国はドイツと 戦争状態に入りました

translation.en: You can imagine what a bitter blow it is to me
translation.ja: 平和的解決に向け行ってきた 努力が実らなかったことは

translation.en: that all my long struggle to win peace has failed.
translation.ja: 平和的解決に向け行ってきた 努力が実らなかったことは 痛恨の極みです

translation.en: The government have made plans
translation.ja: 国を挙げて―

translation.en: under which it will be possible to carry on the work of the nation
translation.ja: 困難に立ち向かう計画を 立てました

translation.en: in the days of stress and strain that may be ahead…
translation.ja: 計画の遂行のためには―

translation.en: …but these plans need your help.
translation.ja: 皆さんの協力が必要です

translation.en: You may be taking your part in the fighting services or as a volunteer.
translation.ja: 戦闘に関わる業務や奉仕に 参加を求められた場合は

translation.en: If so, you will report for duty in accordance with the instructions you receive.
translation.ja: 召集の指示に従って 任務に就いてください

translation.en: It is of vital importance that you should carry on with your jobs.
translation.ja: 与えられた任務の遂行が 不可欠です

translation.en: Now, may God bless you all.
translation.ja: 神のご加護があらんことを
